DOC.brief_summary: Background : Primary hyperparathyroidism ( PHPT ) often overlook underdiagnosed . At present diagnosis PHPT remain challenge base serum calcium ( Ca ) PTH . As serum Ca phosphorous ( P ) inversely related PHPT , Ca/P ratio might consider good candidate tool diagnosis PHPT . AIM : The aim study investigate diagnostic value Ca/P ratio diagnosis PHPT . Study design : Retrospective , observational , cross-sectional , case-control clinical trial carry . Biochemical measurement include PTH , Vitamin D , serum Ca , P , albumin , creatinine .
DOC.brief_title: Serum Calcium Phosphorous Ratio ( Ca/P ) Simple , Inexpensive Screening Tool Diagnosis Primary Hyperparathyroidism
